class.name: TextEdit
class.description: A multiline text editor. It also has limited facilities for editing code, such as syntax highlighting support. For more advanced facilities for editing code, see [CodeEdit]. While entering text, it is possible to insert special characters using Unicode, OEM or Windows alt codes: - To enter Unicode codepoints, hold [kbd]Alt[/kbd] and type the codepoint on the numpad. For example, to enter the character [code]√°[/code] (U+00E1), hold [kbd]Alt[/kbd] and type [kbd]+E1[/kbd] on the numpad (the leading zeroes can be omitted). - To enter OEM codepoints, hold [kbd]Alt[/kbd] and type the code on the numpad. For example, to enter the character [code]√°[/code] (OEM 160), hold [kbd]Alt[/kbd] and type [code]160[/code] on the numpad. - To enter Windows codepoints, hold [kbd]Alt[/kbd] and type the code on the numpad. For example, to enter the character [code]√°[/code] (Windows 0225), hold [kbd]Alt[/kbd] and type [kbd]0[/kbd], [kbd]2[/kbd], [kbd]2[/kbd], [kbd]5[/kbd] on the numpad. The leading zero here must [b]not[/b] be omitted, as this is how Windows codepoints are distinguished from OEM codepoints. [b]Note:[/b] Most viewport, caret, and edit methods contain a [code]caret_index[/code] argument for [member caret_multiple] support. The argument should be one of the following: [code]-1[/code] for all carets, [code]0[/code] for the main caret, or greater than [code]0[/code] for secondary carets in the order they were created. [b]Note:[/b] When holding down [kbd]Alt[/kbd], the vertical scroll wheel will scroll 5 times as fast as it would normally do. This also works in the Godot script editor.

method.name: _backspace
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user presses the backspace key.

method.name: _copy
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user performs a copy operation.

method.name: _cut
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user performs a cut operation.

method.name: _handle_unicode_input
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user types in the provided key [param unicode_char].

method.name: _paste
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user performs a paste operation.

method.name: _paste_primary_clipboard
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user performs a paste operation with middle mouse button. [b]Note:[/b] This method is only implemented on Linux.

method.name: add_caret
method.description: Adds a new caret at the given location. Returns the index of the new caret, or [code]-1[/code] if the location is invalid.

method.name: add_caret_at_carets
method.description: Adds an additional caret above or below every caret. If [param below] is [code]true[/code] the new caret will be added below and above otherwise.

method.name: add_gutter
method.description: Register a new gutter to this [TextEdit]. Use [param at] to have a specific gutter order. A value of [code]-1[/code] appends the gutter to the right.

method.name: add_selection_for_next_occurrence
method.description: Adds a selection and a caret for the next occurrence of the current selection. If there is no active selection, selects word under caret.

method.name: adjust_carets_after_edit
method.deprecated: No longer necessary since methods now adjust carets themselves.
method.description: This method does nothing.

method.name: adjust_viewport_to_caret
method.description: Adjust the viewport so the caret is visible.

method.name: apply_ime
method.description: Applies text from the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Input_method]Input Method Editor[/url] (IME) to each caret and closes the IME if it is open.

method.name: backspace
method.description: Called when the user presses the backspace key. Can be overridden with [method _backspace].

method.name: begin_complex_operation
method.description: Starts a multipart edit. All edits will be treated as one action until [method end_complex_operation] is called.

method.name: begin_multicaret_edit
method.description: Starts an edit for multiple carets. The edit must be ended with [method end_multicaret_edit]. Multicaret edits can be used to edit text at multiple carets and delay merging the carets until the end, so the caret indexes aren't affected immediately. [method begin_multicaret_edit] and [method end_multicaret_edit] can be nested, and the merge will happen at the last [method end_multicaret_edit]. [codeblock] begin_complex_operation() begin_multicaret_edit() for i in range(get_caret_count()): if multicaret_edit_ignore_caret(i): continue # Logic here. end_multicaret_edit() end_complex_operation() [/codeblock]

method.name: cancel_ime
method.description: Closes the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Input_method]Input Method Editor[/url] (IME) if it is open. Any text in the IME will be lost.

method.name: center_viewport_to_caret
method.description: Centers the viewport on the line the editing caret is at. This also resets the [member scroll_horizontal] value to [code]0[/code].

method.name: clear
method.description: Performs a full reset of [TextEdit], including undo history.

method.name: clear_undo_history
method.description: Clears the undo history.

method.name: collapse_carets
method.description: Collapse all carets in the given range to the [param from_line] and [param from_column] position. [param inclusive] applies to both ends. If [method is_in_mulitcaret_edit] is [code]true[/code], carets that are collapsed will be [code]true[/code] for [method multicaret_edit_ignore_caret]. [method merge_overlapping_carets] will be called if any carets were collapsed.

method.name: copy
method.description: Copies the current text selection. Can be overridden with [method _copy].

method.name: cut
method.description: Cut's the current selection. Can be overridden with [method _cut].

method.name: delete_selection
method.description: Deletes the selected text.

method.name: deselect
method.description: Deselects the current selection.

method.name: end_action
method.description: Marks the end of steps in the current action started with [method start_action].

method.name: end_complex_operation
method.description: Ends a multipart edit, started with [method begin_complex_operation]. If called outside a complex operation, the current operation is pushed onto the undo/redo stack.

method.name: end_multicaret_edit
method.description: Ends an edit for multiple carets, that was started with [method begin_multicaret_edit]. If this was the last [method end_multicaret_edit] and [method merge_overlapping_carets] was called, carets will be merged.

method.name: get_caret_column
method.description: Returns the column the editing caret is at.

method.name: get_caret_count
method.description: Returns the number of carets in this [TextEdit].

method.name: get_caret_draw_pos
method.description: Returns the caret pixel draw position.

method.name: get_caret_index_edit_order
method.deprecated: Carets no longer need to be edited in any specific order. If the carets need to be sorted, use [method get_sorted_carets] instead.
method.description: Returns a list of caret indexes in their edit order, this done from bottom to top. Edit order refers to the way actions such as [method insert_text_at_caret] are applied.

method.name: get_caret_line
method.description: Returns the line the editing caret is on.

method.name: get_caret_wrap_index
method.description: Returns the wrap index the editing caret is on.

method.name: get_first_non_whitespace_column
method.description: Returns the first column containing a non-whitespace character on the given line. If there is only whitespace, returns the number of characters.

method.name: get_first_visible_line
method.description: Returns the first visible line.

method.name: get_gutter_count
method.description: Returns the number of gutters registered.

method.name: get_gutter_name
method.description: Returns the name of the gutter at the given index.

method.name: get_gutter_type
method.description: Returns the type of the gutter at the given index. Gutters can contain icons, text, or custom visuals.

method.name: get_gutter_width
method.description: Returns the width of the gutter at the given index.

method.name: get_h_scroll_bar
method.description: Returns the [HScrollBar] used by [TextEdit].

method.name: get_indent_level
method.description: Returns the indent level of the given line. This is the number of spaces and tabs at the beginning of the line, with the tabs taking the tab size into account (see [method get_tab_size]).

method.name: get_last_full_visible_line
method.description: Returns the last visible line. Use [method get_last_full_visible_line_wrap_index] for the wrap index.

method.name: get_last_full_visible_line_wrap_index
method.description: Returns the last visible wrap index of the last visible line.

method.name: get_last_unhidden_line
method.description: Returns the last unhidden line in the entire [TextEdit].

method.name: get_line
method.description: Returns the text of a specific line.

method.name: get_line_background_color
method.description: Returns the custom background color of the given line. If no color is set, returns [code]Color(0, 0, 0, 0)[/code].

method.name: get_line_column_at_pos
method.description: Returns the line and column at the given position. In the returned vector, [code]x[/code] is the column and [code]y[/code] is the line. If [param clamp_line] is [code]false[/code] and [param position] is below the last line, [code]Vector2i(-1, -1)[/code] is returned. If [param clamp_column] is [code]false[/code] and [param position] is outside the column range of the line, [code]Vector2i(-1, -1)[/code] is returned.

method.name: get_line_count
method.description: Returns the number of lines in the text.

method.name: get_line_gutter_icon
method.description: Returns the icon currently in [param gutter] at [param line]. This only works when the gutter type is [constant GUTTER_TYPE_ICON] (see [method set_gutter_type]).

method.name: get_line_gutter_item_color
method.description: Returns the color currently in [param gutter] at [param line].

method.name: get_line_gutter_metadata
method.description: Returns the metadata currently in [param gutter] at [param line].

method.name: get_line_gutter_text
method.description: Returns the text currently in [param gutter] at [param line]. This only works when the gutter type is [constant GUTTER_TYPE_STRING] (see [method set_gutter_type]).

method.name: get_line_height
method.description: Returns the maximum value of the line height among all lines. [b]Note:[/b] The return value is influenced by [theme_item line_spacing] and [theme_item font_size]. And it will not be less than [code]1[/code].

method.name: get_line_ranges_from_carets
method.description: Returns an [Array] of line ranges where [code]x[/code] is the first line and [code]y[/code] is the last line. All lines within these ranges will have a caret on them or be part of a selection. Each line will only be part of one line range, even if it has multiple carets on it. If a selection's end column ([method get_selection_to_column]) is at column [code]0[/code], that line will not be included. If a selection begins on the line after another selection ends and [param merge_adjacent] is [code]true[/code], or they begin and end on the same line, one line range will include both selections.

method.name: get_line_width
method.description: Returns the width in pixels of the [param wrap_index] on [param line].

method.name: get_line_with_ime
method.description: Returns line text as it is currently displayed, including IME composition string.

method.name: get_line_wrap_count
method.description: Returns the number of times the given line is wrapped.

method.name: get_line_wrap_index_at_column
method.description: Returns the wrap index of the given column on the given line. This ranges from [code]0[/code] to [method get_line_wrap_count].

method.name: get_line_wrapped_text
method.description: Returns an array of [String]s representing each wrapped index.

method.name: get_local_mouse_pos
method.description: Returns the local mouse position adjusted for the text direction.

method.name: get_menu
get_minimap_line_at_pos
method.description: Returns the equivalent minimap line at [param position].

method.name: get_minimap_visible_lines
method.description: Returns the number of lines that may be drawn on the minimap.

method.name: get_next_composite_character_column
method.description: Returns the correct column at the end of a composite character like ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π (mending heart; Unicode: [code]U+2764 U+FE0F U+200D U+1FA79[/code]) which is comprised of more than one Unicode code point, if the caret is at the start of the composite character. Also returns the correct column with the caret at mid grapheme and for non-composite characters. [b]Note:[/b] To check at caret location use [code]get_next_composite_character_column(get_caret_line(), get_caret_column())[/code]

method.name: get_next_visible_line_index_offset_from
method.description: Similar to [method get_next_visible_line_offset_from], but takes into account the line wrap indexes. In the returned vector, [code]x[/code] is the line, [code]y[/code] is the wrap index.

method.name: get_next_visible_line_offset_from
method.description: Returns the count to the next visible line from [param line] to [code]line + visible_amount[/code]. Can also count backwards. For example if a [TextEdit] has 5 lines with lines 2 and 3 hidden, calling this with [code]line = 1, visible_amount = 1[/code] would return 3.

method.name: get_pos_at_line_column
method.description: Returns the local position for the given [param line] and [param column]. If [code]x[/code] or [code]y[/code] of the returned vector equal [code]-1[/code], the position is outside of the viewable area of the control. [b]Note:[/b] The Y position corresponds to the bottom side of the line. Use [method get_rect_at_line_column] to get the top side position.

method.name: get_previous_composite_character_column
method.description: Returns the correct column at the start of a composite character like ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π (mending heart; Unicode: [code]U+2764 U+FE0F U+200D U+1FA79[/code]) which is comprised of more than one Unicode code point, if the caret is at the end of the composite character. Also returns the correct column with the caret at mid grapheme and for non-composite characters. [b]Note:[/b] To check at caret location use [code]get_previous_composite_character_column(get_caret_line(), get_caret_column())[/code]

method.name: get_rect_at_line_column
method.description: Returns the local position and size for the grapheme at the given [param line] and [param column]. If [code]x[/code] or [code]y[/code] position of the returned rect equal [code]-1[/code], the position is outside of the viewable area of the control. [b]Note:[/b] The Y position of the returned rect corresponds to the top side of the line, unlike [method get_pos_at_line_column] which returns the bottom side.

method.name: get_saved_version
method.description: Returns the last tagged saved version from [method tag_saved_version].

method.name: get_scroll_pos_for_line
method.description: Returns the scroll position for [param wrap_index] of [param line].

method.name: get_selected_text
method.description: Returns the text inside the selection of a caret, or all the carets if [param caret_index] is its default value [code]-1[/code].

method.name: get_selection_at_line_column
method.description: Returns the caret index of the selection at the given [param line] and [param column], or [code]-1[/code] if there is none. If [param include_edges] is [code]false[/code], the position must be inside the selection and not at either end. If [param only_selections] is [code]false[/code], carets without a selection will also be considered.

method.name: get_selection_column
method.description: Returns the original start column of the selection.

method.name: get_selection_from_column
method.description: Returns the selection begin column. Returns the caret column if there is no selection.

method.name: get_selection_from_line
method.description: Returns the selection begin line. Returns the caret line if there is no selection.

method.name: get_selection_line
method.description: Returns the original start line of the selection.

method.name: get_selection_mode
method.description: Returns the current selection mode.

method.name: get_selection_origin_column
method.description: Returns the origin column of the selection. This is the opposite end from the caret.

method.name: get_selection_origin_line
method.description: Returns the origin line of the selection. This is the opposite end from the caret.

method.name: get_selection_to_column
method.description: Returns the selection end column. Returns the caret column if there is no selection.

method.name: get_selection_to_line
method.description: Returns the selection end line. Returns the caret line if there is no selection.

method.name: get_sorted_carets
method.description: Returns the carets sorted by selection beginning from lowest line and column to highest (from top to bottom of text). If [param include_ignored_carets] is [code]false[/code], carets from [method multicaret_edit_ignore_caret] will be ignored.

method.name: get_tab_size
method.description: Returns the [TextEdit]'s' tab size.

method.name: get_total_gutter_width
method.description: Returns the total width of all gutters and internal padding.

method.name: get_total_visible_line_count
method.description: Returns the total number of lines in the text. This includes wrapped lines and excludes folded lines. If [member wrap_mode] is set to [constant LINE_WRAPPING_NONE] and no lines are folded (see [method CodeEdit.is_line_folded]) then this is equivalent to [method get_line_count]. See [method get_visible_line_count_in_range] for a limited range of lines.

method.name: get_v_scroll_bar
method.description: Returns the [VScrollBar] of the [TextEdit].

method.name: get_version
method.description: Returns the current version of the [TextEdit]. The version is a count of recorded operations by the undo/redo history.

method.name: get_visible_line_count
method.description: Returns the number of lines that can visually fit, rounded down, based on this control's height.

method.name: get_visible_line_count_in_range
method.description: Returns the total number of lines between [param from_line] and [param to_line] (inclusive) in the text. This includes wrapped lines and excludes folded lines. If the range covers all lines it is equivalent to [method get_total_visible_line_count].

method.name: get_word_at_pos
method.description: Returns the word at [param position].

method.name: get_word_under_caret
method.description: Returns a [String] text with the word under the caret's location.

method.name: has_ime_text
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the user has text in the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Input_method]Input Method Editor[/url] (IME).

method.name: has_redo
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a "redo" action is available.

method.name: has_selection
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the user has selected text.

method.name: has_undo
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if an "undo" action is available.

method.name: insert_line_at
method.description: Inserts a new line with [param text] at [param line].

method.name: insert_text
method.description: Inserts the [param text] at [param line] and [param column]. If [param before_selection_begin] is [code]true[/code], carets and selections that begin at [param line] and [param column] will moved to the end of the inserted text, along with all carets after it. If [param before_selection_end] is [code]true[/code], selections that end at [param line] and [param column] will be extended to the end of the inserted text. These parameters can be used to insert text inside of or outside of selections.

method.name: insert_text_at_caret
method.description: Insert the specified text at the caret position.

method.name: is_caret_after_selection_origin
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the caret of the selection is after the selection origin. This can be used to determine the direction of the selection.

method.name: is_caret_visible
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the caret is visible, [code]false[/code] otherwise. A caret will be considered hidden if it is outside the scrollable area when scrolling is enabled. [b]Note:[/b] [method is_caret_visible] does not account for a caret being off-screen if it is still within the scrollable area. It will return [code]true[/code] even if the caret is off-screen as long as it meets [TextEdit]'s own conditions for being visible. This includes uses of [member scroll_fit_content_width] and [member scroll_fit_content_height] that cause the [TextEdit] to expand beyond the viewport's bounds.

method.name: is_dragging_cursor
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the user is dragging their mouse for scrolling, selecting, or text dragging.

method.name: is_gutter_clickable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the gutter at the given index is clickable. See [method set_gutter_clickable].

method.name: is_gutter_drawn
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the gutter at the given index is currently drawn. See [method set_gutter_draw].

method.name: is_gutter_overwritable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the gutter at the given index is overwritable. See [method set_gutter_overwritable].

method.name: is_in_mulitcaret_edit
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a [method begin_multicaret_edit] has been called and [method end_multicaret_edit] has not yet been called.

method.name: is_line_gutter_clickable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the gutter at the given index on the given line is clickable. See [method set_line_gutter_clickable].

method.name: is_line_wrapped
method.description: Returns if the given line is wrapped.

method.name: is_menu_visible
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the menu is visible. Use this instead of [code]get_menu().visible[/code] to improve performance (so the creation of the menu is avoided). See [method get_menu].

method.name: is_mouse_over_selection
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the mouse is over a selection. If [param edges] is [code]true[/code], the edges are considered part of the selection.

method.name: is_overtype_mode_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if overtype mode is enabled. See [method set_overtype_mode_enabled].

method.name: menu_option
method.description: Executes a given action as defined in the [enum MenuItems] enum.

method.name: merge_gutters
method.description: Merge the gutters from [param from_line] into [param to_line]. Only overwritable gutters will be copied. See [method set_gutter_overwritable].

method.name: merge_overlapping_carets
method.description: Merges any overlapping carets. Will favor the newest caret, or the caret with a selection. If [method is_in_mulitcaret_edit] is [code]true[/code], the merge will be queued to happen at the end of the multicaret edit. See [method begin_multicaret_edit] and [method end_multicaret_edit]. [b]Note:[/b] This is not called when a caret changes position but after certain actions, so it is possible to get into a state where carets overlap.

method.name: multicaret_edit_ignore_caret
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param caret_index] should be ignored as part of a multicaret edit. See [method begin_multicaret_edit] and [method end_multicaret_edit]. Carets that should be ignored are ones that were part of removed text and will likely be merged at the end of the edit, or carets that were added during the edit. It is recommended to [code]continue[/code] within a loop iterating on multiple carets if a caret should be ignored.

method.name: paste
method.description: Paste at the current location. Can be overridden with [method _paste].

method.name: paste_primary_clipboard
method.description: Pastes the primary clipboard.

method.name: redo
method.description: Perform redo operation.

method.name: remove_caret
method.description: Removes the given caret index. [b]Note:[/b] This can result in adjustment of all other caret indices.

method.name: remove_gutter
method.description: Removes the gutter at the given index.

method.name: remove_line_at
method.description: Removes the line of text at [param line]. Carets on this line will attempt to match their previous visual x position. If [param move_carets_down] is [code]true[/code] carets will move to the next line down, otherwise carets will move up.

method.name: remove_secondary_carets
method.description: Removes all additional carets.

method.name: remove_text
method.description: Removes text between the given positions.

method.name: search
select
method.description: Selects text from [param origin_line] and [param origin_column] to [param caret_line] and [param caret_column] for the given [param caret_index]. This moves the selection origin and the caret. If the positions are the same, the selection will be deselected. If [member selecting_enabled] is [code]false[/code], no selection will occur. [b]Note:[/b] If supporting multiple carets this will not check for any overlap. See [method merge_overlapping_carets].

method.name: select_all
method.description: Select all the text. If [member selecting_enabled] is [code]false[/code], no selection will occur.

method.name: select_word_under_caret
method.description: Selects the word under the caret.

method.name: set_caret_column
method.description: Moves the caret to the specified [param column] index. If [param adjust_viewport] is [code]true[/code], the viewport will center at the caret position after the move occurs. [b]Note:[/b] If supporting multiple carets this will not check for any overlap. See [method merge_overlapping_carets].

method.name: set_caret_line
method.description: Moves the caret to the specified [param line] index. The caret column will be moved to the same visual position it was at the last time [method set_caret_column] was called, or clamped to the end of the line. If [param adjust_viewport] is [code]true[/code], the viewport will center at the caret position after the move occurs. If [param can_be_hidden] is [code]true[/code], the specified [param line] can be hidden. If [param wrap_index] is [code]-1[/code], the caret column will be clamped to the [param line]'s length. If [param wrap_index] is greater than [code]-1[/code], the column will be moved to attempt to match the visual x position on the line's [param wrap_index] to the position from the last time [method set_caret_column] was called. [b]Note:[/b] If supporting multiple carets this will not check for any overlap. See [method merge_overlapping_carets].

method.name: set_gutter_clickable
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the mouse cursor will change to a pointing hand ([constant Control.CURSOR_POINTING_HAND]) when hovering over the gutter at the given index. See [method is_gutter_clickable] and [method set_line_gutter_clickable].

method.name: set_gutter_custom_draw
method.description: Set a custom draw callback for the gutter at the given index. [param draw_callback] must take the following arguments: A line index [int], a gutter index [int], and an area [Rect2]. This callback only works when the gutter type is [constant GUTTER_TYPE_CUSTOM] (see [method set_gutter_type]).

method.name: set_gutter_draw
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the gutter at the given index is drawn. The gutter type ([method set_gutter_type]) determines how it is drawn. See [method is_gutter_drawn].

method.name: set_gutter_name
method.description: Sets the name of the gutter at the given index.

method.name: set_gutter_overwritable
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the line data of the gutter at the given index can be overridden when using [method merge_gutters]. See [method is_gutter_overwritable].

method.name: set_gutter_type
method.description: Sets the type of gutter at the given index. Gutters can contain icons, text, or custom visuals.

method.name: set_gutter_width
method.description: Set the width of the gutter at the given index.

method.name: set_inline_object_handlers
set_line
method.description: Sets the text for a specific [param line]. Carets on the line will attempt to keep their visual x position.

method.name: set_line_as_center_visible
method.description: Positions the [param wrap_index] of [param line] at the center of the viewport.

method.name: set_line_as_first_visible
method.description: Positions the [param wrap_index] of [param line] at the top of the viewport.

method.name: set_line_as_last_visible
method.description: Positions the [param wrap_index] of [param line] at the bottom of the viewport.

method.name: set_line_background_color
method.description: Sets the custom background color of the given line. If transparent, this color is applied on top of the default background color (See [theme_item background_color]). If set to [code]Color(0, 0, 0, 0)[/code], no additional color is applied.

method.name: set_line_gutter_clickable
method.description: If [param clickable] is [code]true[/code], makes the [param gutter] on the given [param line] clickable. This is like [method set_gutter_clickable], but for a single line. If [method is_gutter_clickable] is [code]true[/code], this will not have any effect. See [method is_line_gutter_clickable] and [signal gutter_clicked].

method.name: set_line_gutter_icon
method.description: Sets the icon for [param gutter] on [param line] to [param icon]. This only works when the gutter type is [constant GUTTER_TYPE_ICON] (see [method set_gutter_type]).

method.name: set_line_gutter_item_color
method.description: Sets the color for [param gutter] on [param line] to [param color].

method.name: set_line_gutter_metadata
method.description: Sets the metadata for [param gutter] on [param line] to [param metadata].

method.name: set_line_gutter_text
method.description: Sets the text for [param gutter] on [param line] to [param text]. This only works when the gutter type is [constant GUTTER_TYPE_STRING] (see [method set_gutter_type]).

method.name: set_overtype_mode_enabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code], enables overtype mode. In this mode, typing overrides existing text instead of inserting text. The [member ProjectSettings.input/ui_text_toggle_insert_mode] action toggles overtype mode. See [method is_overtype_mode_enabled].

method.name: set_search_flags
method.description: Sets the search [param flags]. This is used with [method set_search_text] to highlight occurrences of the searched text. Search flags can be specified from the [enum SearchFlags] enum.

method.name: set_search_text
method.description: Sets the search text. See [method set_search_flags].

method.name: set_selection_mode
method.description: Sets the current selection mode.

method.name: set_selection_origin_column
method.description: Sets the selection origin column to the [param column] for the given [param caret_index]. If the selection origin is moved to the caret position, the selection will deselect.

method.name: set_selection_origin_line
method.description: Sets the selection origin line to the [param line] for the given [param caret_index]. If the selection origin is moved to the caret position, the selection will deselect. If [param can_be_hidden] is [code]false[/code], The line will be set to the nearest unhidden line below or above. If [param wrap_index] is [code]-1[/code], the selection origin column will be clamped to the [param line]'s length. If [param wrap_index] is greater than [code]-1[/code], the column will be moved to attempt to match the visual x position on the line's [param wrap_index] to the position from the last time [method set_selection_origin_column] or [method select] was called.

method.name: set_tab_size
method.description: Sets the tab size for the [TextEdit] to use.

method.name: set_tooltip_request_func
method.description: Provide custom tooltip text. The callback method must take the following args: [code]hovered_word: String[/code].

method.name: skip_selection_for_next_occurrence
method.description: Moves a selection and a caret for the next occurrence of the current selection. If there is no active selection, moves to the next occurrence of the word under caret.

method.name: start_action
method.description: Starts an action, will end the current action if [param action] is different. An action will also end after a call to [method end_action], after [member ProjectSettings.gui/timers/text_edit_idle_detect_sec] is triggered or a new undoable step outside the [method start_action] and [method end_action] calls.

method.name: swap_lines
method.description: Swaps the two lines. Carets will be swapped with the lines.

method.name: tag_saved_version
method.description: Tag the current version as saved.

method.name: undo
method.description: Perform undo operation.

The [theme_item focus] [StyleBox] is displayed [i]over[/i] the base [StyleBox], so a partially transparent [StyleBox] should be used to ensure the base [StyleBox] remains visible. A [StyleBox] that represents an outline or an underline works well for this purpose. To disable the focus visual effect, assign a [StyleBoxEmpty] resource.
